languages.text: {n}Вир сгибается в раболепном поклоне, однако глаза его полны отчаяния.{/n} "Воля посланни{mf|ка|цы} небес есть воля Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вир сгибается в раболепном поклоне, однако глаза его полны отчаяния.{/n} "Воля посланни{mf|ка|цы} небес есть воля Его".

languages.text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."
languages.original_text: {n}Вир сгибается в раболепном поклоне, однако глаза его полны отчаяния.{/n} "Воля посланни{mf|ка|цы} небес есть воля Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is the will of the Exalted One."
{n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is the will of the Exalted One."
{n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."
{n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."
{n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."

languages.text: {n}ヴィルは盲従的にお辞儀をしたが、その目には絶望が満ちていた。{/n}「天の使節の意志こそ、あの御方の意志です」
languages.original_text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィルは盲従的にお辞儀をしたが、その目には絶望が満ちていた。{/n}「天の使節の意志こそ、あの御方の意志です」

languages.text: {n}Vir vous adresse une révérence servile, mais ses yeux sont emplis de désespoir.{/n} « La volonté de l'émissaire céleste est Sienne. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir vous adresse une révérence servile, mais ses yeux sont emplis de désespoir.{/n} « La volonté de l'émissaire céleste est Sienne. »

languages.text: {n}维尔向你热切地鞠了一躬，但眼神中却满是绝望。{/n}“使者的意志就是神皇的意志。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}维尔向你热切地鞠了一躬，但眼神中却满是绝望。{/n}“使者的意志就是神皇的意志。”

languages.text: {n}Vir te dedica una reverencia servil, pero sus ojos están llenos de desesperación.{/n} «La voluntad {mf|del Enviado Divino|de la Enviada Divina} es Su voluntad».
languages.original_text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir te dedica una reverencia servil, pero sus ojos están llenos de desesperación.{/n} «La voluntad {mf|del Enviado Divino|de la Enviada Divina} es Su voluntad».

languages.text: {n}Vir verneigt sich unterwürfig vor dir, doch in seinen Augen steht die Verzweiflung.{/n} "Der Wille {mf|des himmlischen Gesandten|der himmlischen Gesandten} ist sein Wille."
languages.original_text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir verneigt sich unterwürfig vor dir, doch in seinen Augen steht die Verzweiflung.{/n} "Der Wille {mf|des himmlischen Gesandten|der himmlischen Gesandten} ist sein Wille."

languages.text: {n}Vir hevesle önünde eğilse de gözleri umutsuzlukla bakıyor.{/n} "Kutsal Elçi'nin iradesi, O'nun iradesidir."
languages.original_text: {n}Vir eagerly gives you a servile bow, but his eyes are full of despair.{/n} "The will of the Heavenly Envoy is His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir hevesle önünde eğiliyor ama gözleri umutsuzlukla bakıyor.{/n} "Kutsal Elçi'nin iradesi, O'nun iradesidir."
